Package lejos.hardware.motor

Access to the motors that the EV3 supports.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MotorRegulator Interface for motor regulation regulate velocity; also stop motor at desired rotation angle.
Tachometer Abstraction for the tachometer built into NXT motors.
 

Class Summary
BaseRegulatedMotor Abstraction for a Regulated motor motor.
BasicMotor Abstraction for basic motor operations.
EV3LargeRegulatedMotor Abstraction for a Large Lego EV3/NXT motor.
EV3MediumRegulatedMotor Abstraction for a Medium Lego EV3/NXT motor.
JavaMotorRegulator Java based regulator regulate velocity; also stop motor at desired rotation angle.
JavaMotorRegulator.Controller This class provides a single thread that drives all of the motor regulation process.
MindsensorsGlideWheelMRegulatedMotor Abstraction for a Mindsensors Glidewheel-M equipped PF motor.
Note: These settings are for the "M" motor.
Motor Motor class contains 3 instances of regulated motors.
NXTMotor Abstraction for an NXT motor with no speed regulation.
NXTRegulatedMotor Abstraction for a Lego NXT motor.
RCXMotor Abstraction for an RCX motor.
 

Package lejos.hardware.motor Description

Access to the motors that the EV3 supports. Motors supported by specific controllers are in lejos.hardwae.device.
